item.title: “Hardik wants to play all the games”: Paras Mhambrey confirms India won’t rest Hardik Pandya or other key players for Super 12 match vs Netherlands
item.description: “Hardik wants to play all the games”: Paras Mhambrey confirms India won’t rest Hardik Pandya or other key players for Super 12 match vs Netherlands India’s bowling coach Paras Mhambrey has said that Hardik Pandya wants to play all the game and he won’t be rested against the Netherlands.
